column1: 早晨，电线钳从工具箱里被取出来，准备开始新的一天的工作。
column2: Morning: The wire pliers are taken out from the toolbox, ready to start a new day of work.

column1: 首先，电线钳被用于剥离电线的绝缘层，以便能够接触到导线的金属部分。
column2: First, the wire pliers are used to strip the insulation layer of wires, allowing access to the metal part of the conductor.

column1: 接下来，电线钳被用于剪断电线，以适应不同的长度和需求。
column2: Next, the wire pliers are used to cut wires to fit different lengths and requirements.

column1: 电线钳还被用于弯曲电线，以适应特定的电路布线要求。
column2: The wire pliers are also used to bend wires to adapt to specific circuit wiring needs.

column1: 下午，电线钳被用于连接电线和插座，确保安全可靠的电气连接。
column2: Afternoon: The wire pliers are used to connect wires and sockets, ensuring safe and reliable electrical connections.

column1: 在一次紧急维修任务中，电线钳帮助电工修复了一个短路问题，迅速切断了有问题的电线。
column2: During an emergency repair task, the wire pliers assist the electrician in fixing a short circuit issue by quickly cutting off the problematic wire.

column1: 傍晚时分，电线钳被仔细清洁和保养，以确保其在下一次工作中保持良好的工作状态。
column2: In the evening, the wire pliers are carefully cleaned and maintained to ensure they remain in good working condition for the next job.

column1: 一天的工作结束后，电线钳被放回工具箱，等待下一次使用。
column2: At the end of the workday, the wire pliers are put back into the toolbox, awaiting their next use.
